name: Enigma (itch) (sei556)
description:
Enigma is meant to become a hard puzzle game.

Your only companion is the demi-god named "Jimmy" who claims to be guarding the truth with all the riddles and puzzles.

Can you solve them all?

[Enigma is currently just a prototype, There are some known bugs and the UI is very experimental. However, the core functions should be functional as of right now]

If you want to follow whatever I do, check out my Twitter @Vicious_Fate

If you want to throw money at me, I gladly accept your offer at https://streamlabs.com/vicious_fate/#/

Also, check out https://twitter.com/typodermic, I used one of his fonts and some of his amazing fonts might be interesting for your project too!
